content.en: Efficient distributed queries: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the efficiency of distributed query processing in databases. These algorithms, such as domain-specific semijoin operation, genetic algorithm approach, and adaptive algorithms for join processing, aim to reduce data communication costs, minimize communication cost in distributed database systems, optimize data allocation and query optimization, and minimize data transfers. By attributing agency to these algorithms, researchers are finding ways to enhance the performance and optimization of distributed query processing in distributed database systems.
content.da: Effektive distribuerede forespørgsler: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten af distribueret forespørgselsbehandling i databaser. Disse algoritmer, såsom domænespecifik semijoin-operation, genetisk algoritme-tilgang og adaptive algoritmer til join-behandling, har til formål at reducere datakommunikationsomkostninger, minimere kommunikationsomkostninger i distribuerede databasesystemer, optimere dataallokering og forespørgselsoptimering samt minimere datatransfers. Ved at tilskrive agentur til disse algoritmer finder forskere måder at forbedre ydeevnen og optimeringen af distribueret forespørgselsbehandling i distribuerede databasesystemer.
